oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Common Surgical Procedures in Camelids
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Anderson, David E.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: llamas
alpacas
surgical procedures
castration
gastrointestinal surgery
cesarean section
angular limb deformity
tooth-root abscess
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Veterinarians are commonly asked to perform surgery on llamas and alpacas. Several common surgical procedures are described including castration, gastrointestinal surgery, cesarean section, angular limb deformity and tooth-root abscess treatment.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2004; 118-125
